lead_paragraph: Don Shula, the legendary coach of the 1972 Dolphins, the last team to finish a season undefeated, suggested that if the Patriots finish the season unbeaten, the feat would be tainted.
snippet: Don Shula, the legendary coach of the 1972 Dolphins, the last team to finish a season undefeated, suggested that if the Patriots finish the season unbeaten, the feat would be tainted.
